subject: Hello
description_text: Hello can anybody respond to me please?

conversations.body_text: Hi C. Mason,    Is there anything I can do to help you?

Yes I've been trying to get a hold of you guys about an order I placed. I feel like I'm being ignored.


________________________________

Hi C. Mason,  Hello, please provide your order number so I can help you check the status. If you don’t have the order number, you can provide the payment date, amount, and country, and I will help you look it up. Don’t worry.
